Title: Farthingale
Plot: Crews and Reese investigate a gas explosion in which an IRS agent leading a double life is the victim. Was it an accident or arson?  Was the IRS agent trying to be a hero?  Crews is once again a suspect in a murder investigation when the detective who handled his case is found dead.
GuestStars: Lori Rom, Victor Rivers, Diana Parks, Michael Harney, Phyllis Lyons, Judith Moreland
